infobox.Japanese title:: 空飛ぶハロウィンカボチャ  (Soratobu Harowin Kabocha)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Azusa Enomoto  Night Baron
infobox.Animation director:: Seiji Muta (supervisor)  Kosei Takahashi  Yusuke Shimizu  Eiichi Tokura
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Masanori Hashimoto (sub-character)  Hiroshi Ogawa (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Mikiko Enomoto as Azusa Enomoto  Hiroko Emori as Tamie Kono  Yuka Terasaki as Tomomi Kashiyama  Masaki Aizawa as Satoshi Mizunuma  Takashi Kondo as Masashi Kokubu  Shuichi Uchida as Kajiyama  Yuki Okada as Kuwano  Karin Nanami as Mother  Natsumi Kawaida as Girl

sections.Situation:
Beika Shopping Centre is holding a jack-o'-lantern carving contest for halloween. One night, Kuwano and Kajiyama are walking home at night when they pass a road with jack-o'-lantern placed in front of the houses. Suddenly the wind blows strong, and three ghosts with jack-o'-lantern-shaped head appear.
The next day, Conan goes to Poirot because Kogoro and Ran are going out. There, Azusa is making some jack-o'-lantern and, in exchange for a milk tea, she asks Conan to help her. They later talk about the story behind halloween. Azusa then mentions about the appearance of jack-o'-lantern ghost, which became a hot topic after many people saw it last night. Conan then ask about Amuro whereabout, to Azusa answers that he is taking a few days off. She wishes that could put a collar on Amuro and keep him at Poirot. She decide to ask Conan something about Amuro, but get interupted by Tamie Kono, Tomomi Kashiyama, and Satoshi Mizunuma, whose jack-o'-lanterns have been stolen.

Conan and Azusa decide to check the neighborhood to find who stole the jack-o'lanterns.

sections.Resolution: Both later admit the crime, but they have a reason. Turns out that Tamie's students already made a jack-o'-lantern as a surprise for Tamie during her hospitalization. However, Tamie was discharged early and managed to make one on her own. In order to not disappoint the children, they hid Tamie's jack-o'-lantern. Later, the children arrive at Tamie's house and surprise her with the jack-o'-lantern they have made. Conan and Azusa will handle the hidden jack-o'-lanterns.
